title: Memory Forensics with Volatility
description: Analyze a memory dump to uncover a hidden flag using Volatility.
hints: Consider what common processes may contain useful information.
Use Volatility to list processes and examine their memory space.
Look for strings in memory that might contain the flag.
learningObjectives: Understand how to use Volatility for memory forensics.
Learn to search and interpret memory dumps.
Practice extracting hidden information from memory.
